Fur | Storage Pockets | Adjustability\u0: Arctic Tech shell has a DWR water-repellent finish and is wind resistant
Coyote Fur ruff is removable and has shaping wire

Specifications.Temperature Rating:
Thermal Experience Index Rating: 4 (-15 to -25°C)
The Thermal Experience Index(TEI): Canada Goose' five-point system is designed to help you make the right selection from their expansive collections of Winter Apparel.
Specifications.Materials:
[outer shell] 192 GSM, Arctic-Tech 85% Polyester/15% Cotton blend with a DWR finish
[lining] 55gsm, Nylon plain weave treated with water-repellent finish
Specifications.Water Resistance: DWR finish (Durable Water Repellent) helps repel water from fabric surface
Specifications.Fur: Coyote Fur Ruff along hood is removable
Specifications.Pockets:
9 pockets, includes:
 4 fleece-lined exterior pockets, 1 side access chest pocket, slash pockets on lower handwarmer pockets, interior media pocket, interior drop mesh pockets
